response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique offering holds immense value, not just monetarily but also in terms of its capabilities to enhance your business operations and elevate your brand's reputation.

Given its exceptional quality and versatility, I am extending an exclusive invitation for you to consider acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to the market value, making it an opportunity not to be missed.

Should you decide to proceed with this purchase, you will gain access to unparalleled features and benefits that will undoubtedly contribute to your company's growth and success. Our team is committed to ensuring a seamless experience, from consultation to delivery and beyond.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there are any questions you have regarding the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to the advancement of your business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
